      • aggregateBuys

        public static void aggregateBuys(java.lang.String buyFileName,
                                 java.lang.String aggregatedFileName)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        This method aggregates all records of the buys file that contain the same session id and same product id. This is why the timestamp is left out in the result
        Parameters:
        buyFileName - The path of the buys file that should be aggregated
        aggregatedFileName - The path of the file that sould be created
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • aggregateClicks

        public static void aggregateClicks(java.lang.String clickFileName,
                                   java.lang.String aggregatedFileName)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        This method aggregates the clicks with same session id and same product id. Timestamp is left out in the result
        Parameters:
        clickFileName - Path of the clicks file that should be aggregated
        aggregatedFileName - Path of the buys file that should be created
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • joinDatasets

        public static void joinDatasets(java.lang.String clickFileName,
                                java.lang.String buyFileName,
                                java.lang.String mergedFileName)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        This method joins a clicks file and a buys file. Both files have to be aggregated.
        Parameters:
        clickFileName - path of the clicks file
        buyFileName - path of the buys file
        mergedFileName - path of the merged file to be created
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
